name: The Last Night of Khordaldrum
description:
Jump into the keep of Khordaldrum (Core-Dole-Drum) in order to play as the the humans in order to hold off the incoming waves of monsters as long as possible to allow the citizens to evacuate! Or play as the monster's advocate and storm the keep, trying to slaughter the humans as quickly as possible!

You can click on any of your units at anytime to take control of their actions. Each unit is different and there are even human commanders which can give special orders to other nearby humans.

Either try to survive as long as possible while playing as the Human's Defender or attempt to claim Khordaldrum as quickly as you can while playing as the Monster's Advocate!

I would love to hear your best times!

Default Controls

These are rebindable.

  • Move Left/Right: 'A'/'D'
  • Fly Up/Down: 'W'/'S'
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Pause/Menu: ESC
  • Take Control of Unit: Left Click
  • Release Control of Unit: Left Shift

Music:

"A Bit Of Hope" by David Fesliyan

"8 Bit Menu" by David Renda

A game by: Damian Verellen Jr.
